pages.title: Dar Tanzin
pages.body: Dar Tanzin just 're-hit' the USA from Iceland, and is veddy veddy excited to be joining WHITE NOISE for their public debut. He speaks hardly any English, has agoraphobia so normally is out of reach and just hides on Stage right, riffing away on his wildly modified Gibson Les Paul Customs, his favorite. Oddly enough, Dar was born in New York City, so he is a citizen, just spent his life in Iceland yah.

pages.title: Lance Sawyer
pages.body: Bassist Lance Sawyer is from Lake Placid NY, formerly of Element and Mirage, Lance prefers Warwick instruments. He is the powerhouse member of the band, and recently returned from the Super Hero Reconstruction Lab in Anaheim CA. His main influences are Geddy Lee, Steve Harris, Cliff Burton. Lance lives in Jay NY. His main gig is playing bass & songwriting, and he has many other interests.

pages.title: Craig Roberts
pages.body: Drummer Craig Roberts joined the band in 2014, born in Hollywood, CA, Craig's main influences are Mike Portnoy, Matt Halpern, Neil Peart. He uses Tama drums, Evans heads, Meinl and Sabian cymbals. He's back East now enlightened from an animal skin drumhead junket in Mongolia. He lives in Lake Placid NY. His main interest is playing drums, although he has other interests as well.
